Class FESI.jslib.JSUtil 

FESI.jslib.JSUtil
public abstract class JSUtil
Abstract class used for interfacing the FESI EcmaScript interpreter with Java code. Contains the static utility functions, as the evaluator factory and object factory.

JSUtil()

getVersion()
Return the version identifier of the interpreter
getWelcomeText()
Return the welcome text (including copyright and version) of the interpreter (as two lines)
makeEvaluator()
Create a new evaluator, with no extension loaded.
makeEvaluator(String[])
Create a new evaluator, with specfied extensions loaded.

JSUtil 
 public JSUtil()

makeEvaluator 
 public static JSGlobalObject makeEvaluator() throws JSException
Create a new evaluator, with no extension loaded.

Returns:
The global object of the created evaluator.
Throws: JSException
For any error during initialization
makeEvaluator 
 public static JSGlobalObject makeEvaluator(String extensions[]) throws JSException
Create a new evaluator, with specfied extensions loaded.

Parameters:
extensions - The class name of the extensions to load.
Returns:
The global object of the created evaluator.
Throws: JSException
For any error during initialization
getVersion 
 public static String getVersion()
Return the version identifier of the interpreter

getWelcomeText 
 public static String getWelcomeText()
Return the welcome text (including copyright and version) of the interpreter (as two lines)
